title: 为什么1.7.10就无法启动
author: 老烈伟
txt_content:
[21:16:07] [main/INFO]: Loading tweak class name cpw.mods.fml.common.launcher.FMLTweaker
[21:16:07] [main/INFO]: Using primary tweak class name cpw.mods.fml.common.launcher.FMLTweaker
[21:16:07] [main/INFO]: Calling tweak class cpw.mods.fml.common.launcher.FMLTweaker
[21:16:07] [main/INFO]: Forge Mod Loader version 7.10.0.1150 for Minecraft 1.7.10 loading
[21:16:07] [main/INFO]: Java is Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM, version 1.8.0_221, running on Windows 10:amd64:10.0, installed at C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.8.0_221
[21:16:07] [main/INFO]: Loading tweak class name cpw.mods.fml.common.launcher.FMLInjectionAndSortingTweaker
[21:16:07] [main/INFO]: Loading tweak class name cpw.mods.fml.common.launcher.FMLDeobfTweaker
[21:16:07] [main/INFO]: Calling tweak class cpw.mods.fml.common.launcher.FMLInjectionAndSortingTweaker
[21:16:07] [main/ERROR]: Unable to launch
java.util.ConcurrentModificationException
        at java.util.ArrayList$Itr.checkForComodification(Unknown Source) ~[?:1.8.0_221]
        at java.util.ArrayList$Itr.remove(Unknown Source) ~[?:1.8.0_221]
        at net.minecraft.launchwrapper.Launch.launch(Launch.java:117) [launchwrapper-1.9.jar:?]
        at net.minecraft.launchwrapper.Launch.main(Launch.java:28) [launchwrapper-1.9.jar:?]

replies.author: 阴阳师元素祭祀
replies.txt_content:
装了什么mod
检查下版本 试试更新下forge mod

replies.author: ItIsEnderman
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 ItIsEnderman 于 2019-9-4 21:36 编辑 

launchWrapper 1.9不知道是Bug还是啥原因，在Java8下调用某个类时总是在用iterator进行renove操作时触发这个异常。对此，解决方法:
1.新版Forge（比如1558,1614）已经在使用launchwrapper 1.12，该问题已不存在，所以可以考虑更新Forge
2.治标不治本的换Java7

replies.author: skyliye
replies.txt_content:
先试试不用正版账号登录呢（如果你用的是正版账号的话），用离线模式。类似的问题我也是近期才发现，你可以使用reauth mod在游戏内正版登录以及切换账号

https://media.forgecdn.net/files/2433/392/ReAuth-3.5.0.jar

replies.author: ps360papa
replies.txt_content: 看样子你加载了1.9的jar包？1.7.X版本完美对应的java是1.7的1.8之后对应是java1.8的，所以你要是一台机器装两个java版本，环境变量容易出问题。
